themes: Overemphasis on EDI/intersectionality in grant scoring
Negative impact on established arts groups
key_phrases: intersectionality and diversity took up too much of the scoring criteria
leaving a lot of established arts groups without support from the city
too much of a shakeup, especially after the pandemic devastated the performing arts industry
grants should be multi-year operating grants
to better ensure sustainability among grantees
not grants that can change from year to year
barriers_identified: Overweighting of EDI/intersectionality in scoring criteria
Lack of support for established arts groups
solutions_proposed: Reduce emphasis on intersectionality and diversity in scoring criteria
Provide multi-year operating grants to ensure sustainability
